content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
To keep swinging away try our new game Everybody's Golf!

End of Service Announcement for Hot Shots Golf: World Invitational™

Thank you for playing Hot Shots Golf: World Invitational™

Online services for Hot Shots Golf: World Invitational™ will end on December 21, 2017 at 0:00am PST/3:00am EST.

Online features will not be playable after servers close. You can continue playing offline modes.

There is only a short amount of time remaining, however Hot Shots Golf™:World Invitational development and operations team hope that you can all continue to enjoy our title until the end of service. And we would like to extend our thanks and best wishes to you all who continue to enjoy and play our game.

Golf With Your Friends!

The over-the-top golf franchise is back using a wide array of PS Vita system features including front and rear touch for shot preparation, online tournaments, and the ability to look around the course in real time. Golf has never been so deep on a handheld system.

• Non-stop challenges — Stay connected with your friends' latest scores to stay on top of the leaderboard
• Innovative Touch Panel Controls — Access all the info for the next shot with this new touch sensitive interface
• 360 Perspective — Look down the fairway and golf course in real time to set up the perfect shot

1-30 player(s)
Network Players - 2
1500KB Minimum

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.

©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Hot Shots Golf is a registered trademark and Hot Shots Golf: World Invitational is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC
